## GridTabulator.downloadDataAs() method

Download the Grid data as a file of the specified type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
downloadDataAs(type: 'csv' | 'json' | 'html', fileName: string, params?: DownloadOptions, filter?: RowRangeLookup): void;
```
